headline: Australians Already Hit Face New Round of Fires
abstract: The relentlessness of the blazes is increasingly pushing Australia beyond crisis mode into anger and fatigue.
lead_paragraph: BATLOW, Australia — Surrounded by hills burned black as soot, with homes flattened and cattle decimated, Australians in the country’s east on Friday confronted a new round of  supercharged bush fires as high winds drove the fires back toward towns that had already burned at least once before.
